#summary Mouse
#labels Branch-Type-Class
#sidebar BranchTypesMachineAutomationSidebar

= Introduction =

Simulating mouse events.

= Callables =

|| click_at || void ( int int int ) || Simulate a mouse click at positon (x, y) with the button number as the third argument (0 is left-click, 1 is right-click, 2 is middle-click) ||
|| hold_at (optional) || void ( integer integer integer ) || Press and hold the mouse button at position x, y - the last parameter is the button to press and hold. ||
|| release_at (optional) || void ( integer integer integer ) || Release the previously held mouse button at position x, y - the last parameter is the button to release. ||
